resources.string: Curiosity is a car-sized robotic rover exploring Gale Crater on Mars as part of NASA\'s Mars Science Laboratory mission (MSL).
Opportunity is a robotic rover active on Mars since 2004. It landed in Meridiani Planum on January 25, 2004.
Spirit, also known as MER-A (Mars Exploration Rover A) or MER-2, is a robotic rover on Mars, active from 2004 to 2010. Spirit became stuck in soft soil.

Explore the landscape of planet Mars closely with MarsRover. This app is consuming nasa api (api.nasa.gov) to display photos taken by rover(Curiosity, Opportunity, Spirit) operating on planet Mars. These rovers send fresh photos everyday taken by multiple cameras installed.
This is not an official App, just developed it for learning purpose. If you are from NASA/ISRO or anybody who are curious about, I love to hear from you.
